name: MENTAL|BOX
description:
NONEXISTENT DISC.

After a tough night of drinking, you appear in a closed room, where in the distance exists a tower known as "The Purificator"

This room seems to be important, But it seems that everything will end badly, if you make a SINGLE MISTAKE.
